VALID_ERR_MSG.MIN_LENGTH: Employee name must have {{minValue}} to {{maxValue}} characters.
VALID_ERR_MSG.MAX_LENGTH: Employee name must have {{minValue}} to {{maxValue}} characters.
VALID_ERR_MSG.INVALID: The Employee name can only have printable characters.

0.MESSAGE: The request cannot be processed because of a connection error.
0.TITLE: Error in connection

400.MESSAGE: The server was unable to process the request. Please try again.
400.TITLE: Bad Request

401.MESSAGE: Access has been denied because of invalid credentials.
401.TITLE: Unauthorized

403.MESSAGE: You do not have the permission to perform this request.
403.TITLE: Forbidden

404.MESSAGE: The requested resource was not found.
404.TITLE: Not Found

405.MESSAGE: The request method is not supported for the requested resource.
405.TITLE: Access Denied

408.MESSAGE: There was a server timeout. Please try again.
408.TITLE: Request time out

409.MESSAGE: The request cannot be processed because of a conflict.
409.TITLE: Conflict

422.MESSAGE: The server cannot handle the request because of a semantic error.
422.TITLE: Unprocessable Entity

500.MESSAGE: A server error prevented the processing of your request.
500.TITLE: Internal Server Error

502.MESSAGE: The server received an invalid response while trying to process the request.
502.TITLE: Bad Gateway

503.MESSAGE: The server is unable to handle the request because of temporary unavailability or scheduled maintenance. Please try again later.
503.TITLE: Service Unavailable

SUCCESS_DEFAULT.MESSAGE: The request has been completed successfully.
SUCCESS_DEFAULT.TITLE: Success

ERROR_DEFAULT.MESSAGE: The request cannot be completed because of an error.
ERROR_DEFAULT.TITLE: Error

UNKNOWN.MESSAGE: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again.
UNKNOWN.TITLE: Unknown error
